title: Set hero section tagline text color to white

requirements.text: In the hero section component, change the text color of the sentence “Experience exceptional accommodations and real estate services in one of Mexico's most beautiful colonial cities” to white, and ensure this color change applies only within the hero section.

quotes: change the text color of the sentence: "Experience exceptional accommodations and real estate services in one of Mexico's most beautiful colonial cities" to white
1. hero section. 2. only in that section and 3. just the color change

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page hero section, the specified sentence renders in white text.
No other instances of the same sentence (if present elsewhere) change color as a result of this update.
No other hero section styling (font size, spacing, shadows, etc.) is changed beyond the text color.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the hero background image, gradient overlay, buttons, header, or any other page section styling.
Do not introduce new themes, typography changes, or additional styling adjustments beyond the requested text color change.
